page.title: 18"Metheringham Authors,4S"
page.content:
DOMESDAY PROJECT:METHERINGHAM SCHOOL. JULY 1985.
CLASS TEACHER:MR. S.SCULLY.B.Ed.(HONS) DEPUTY HEADMASTER.
The following children from Class 4S took part in the Project. {Ann Harrison,Hayley Woodward,Stephen {Barnes,Kevin McCallum, Matthew {Karran,Michelle Williams,Michelle {Portas,Julie Maplethorpe,Andrea Ruane, {David Mann,Alison Peckham,Lucy {Chaloner,Andrew Gray.Maria Duggins, {Lisa Stancer,Mark Greenwood,Mark Fox {William Meldrum,Victoria Scholey, {Sarah Pearse, Sarah Gray, Sarah {Chapman,James Cook,Glenn {Fletcher,Chris Kipling , Sonia {Stancer and Paul Ismanyckyj.
